item.description:
Cost: $100 per person

Includes: Overnight in a rented apartment on the beach, surfboard rental, 2 lessons (one on saturday and one on sunday, time to be determined by tides).

We can go out for a group for meals, or all contribute some money towards a backyard bbq sort of thing which could be fun.

All levels welcome, this is a great deal weather you use the rental/lesson or want to bring your own board and surf.

Apartment is a rental right on the beach run by the owner of Zapstix. Will provide address to attendees.

*********

Plan on arriving at Zapstix Surf Shop between 5:00pm and 9:00pm. To square away payment and be let into the place. If you can't get there before 9pm, call Mike at the surf shop: (603) 474-7873Â try and make other arrangements.

*********

as of today...there is no additional accommodations for people who have been waitlisted to stay overnight. For anyone who has RSVP'd "yes" but can no longer make it, please be sure to update your RSVP so that someone else gets a chance to go.
item.name: Surf Weekend in Seabrook NH
